*** The Clifton City Council is scheduled for Tuesday, February 10th, at 6PM in the Clifton Civic Center Council Chambers at 403 W 3rd Street. *** City offices will be closed on Monday, February 16th for Presidents' Day. *** Sanitation services changed on October 1st to a once weekly cart pick up and weekly bulk/brush pick up. You can find more information on the Public Notices page of our website. ***
